ingredients: 1 pound (2 cups) ricotta, preferably drained (fresh, whole milk ricotta if possible; cow’s or sheep’s milk ricotta)
1 cup baked, mashed or riced fresh pumpkin (or sweetpotato)
½ cup (2 ounces), finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano
2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced or pressed
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
